mapper.select: SELECT me.id, me.`name`, me.`file` , eh.* FROM `emoji_history` AS eh JOIN `main_emoji` AS me ON eh.main_emoji_id = me.id where `u_id`=#{uId} ORDER BY eh.create_at DESC LIMIT #{start},10
SELECT me.id, me.`name`, me.`file` , eh.* FROM `emoji_history` AS eh JOIN `main_emoji` AS me ON eh.main_emoji_id = me.id where `merchant_id`=#{merchantId}
mapper.update: update `emoji_history` set `cancel_amount`=`price`, `cancel_yn`='Y', `update_at`=NOW() where `merchant_id`=#{merchantId} and create_at <= DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 3 DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT ph.*, p.address AS productAddress, p.host_id AS productHostId, p.main_category_id AS productMainCategoryId, p.sub_category_id AS productSubCategoryId, p.price AS productPrice, p.file AS productFile, p.`name` as `prodName`, u.`name` as `userName` FROM `product_history` AS ph JOIN `product` AS p ON ph.p_id = p.p_id JOIN `user` AS u ON p.host_id = u.u_id WHERE ph.`u_id`=#{uId} ORDER BY ph.id DESC LIMIT #{start},10

SELECT q.*, cu.`name` AS userName, au.`name` AS adminName FROM `qna` AS q JOIN `user` AS cu ON q.u_id = cu.u_id LEFT JOIN `user` AS au ON q.admin_id = au.u_id WHERE q.u_id =#{uId} and q.`delete_yn` = 'N'
ORDER BY q.id DESC LIMIT #{start},10

choose.when: AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

mapper.select: SELECT me.`name`, me.`file` , eh.* FROM `emoji_history` AS eh JOIN `main_emoji` AS me ON eh.main_emoji_id = me.id where `u_id`=#{uId} AND `cancel_yn` = "N" ORDER BY me.id DESC LIMIT #{start},8

SELECT w.id as `id`, w.p_id as `productId`, w.u_id as `uId`, w.create_at as `createAt`, p.address, p.`name`, p.price, p.`file` as `productFile` FROM `wish_list` AS w JOIN `product` AS p ON w.p_id = p.p_id WHERE w.u_id=#{uId} ORDER BY w.id DESC LIMIT #{start},6
